messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The Natural Child Project
messages.msgSnippet:
That s wonderful, Joyce!  I recently shared TNCP with my sister... she had
spanked her DS for the first time and felt really bad about it... so I
shared that
messages.messageBody:
That's wonderful, Joyce! I recently shared TNCP with my sister... she had
spanked her DS for the first time and felt really bad about it... so I
shared that site with her. I'm hoping that one day I'll feel comfortable
enough to share unschooling with her. :) She's already crunchy... and AP
and Unschooling just seem to be a natural progression of that lifestyle.

Lesa
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------


Joyce Fetteroll <fetteroll@earthlink .net> wrote:
My Joyfully Rejoycing site was picked as The Natural Child Project
parenting site of the month. :-) The review is at:

http://www.naturalc hild.org/ site_of_the_ month/

Joyce

.

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The Natural Child Project
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh, dear another pun on my name! I m starting to misspell rejoicing as rejoycing because of the pun. ;-) Thank you all :-) Joyce [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
On Oct 14, 2006, at 8:51 AM, Elissa Jill Cleaveland wrote:

> TNCP was a site that was invaluable to me when I had my third child
> and discovered AP. I'm glad that many of those AP parents will have
> an intro to continuing the "unfettered" life!

Oh, dear another pun on my name! I'm starting to misspell rejoicing
as rejoycing because of the pun. ;-)

Thank you all :-)

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The Natural Child Project
messages.msgSnippet: TNCP was a site that was invaluable to me when I had my third child and discovered AP. I m glad that many of those AP parents will have an intro to continuing
messages.messageBody:
TNCP was a site that was invaluable to me when I had my third child and discovered AP. I'm glad that many of those AP parents will have an intro to continuing the "unfettered" life!
Elissa Jill
A Kindersher saychel iz oychet a saychel.
"A Child's wisdom is also wisdom." ~Yiddish Proverb

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The Natural Child Project
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, your site is my parenting site of the year :-) Thank you so much for all you ve done. This list as well, thank you Ren, and Kelly (yesterday I read the
messages.messageBody:
Joyce, your site is my parenting site of the year :-) Thank you so
much for all you've done.

This list as well, thank you Ren, and Kelly (yesterday I read the
very first 30 posts :-D )

And the rest of you, too: Thank you all for doing this :-)

Johanna
